A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 29, 2010''', at 21:38 UTC.<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"16:38:44 <Notch> Peerko, vede: Try now. If it doesn't redownload the jars, wait a few secs and try again"}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed "Unable to validate certificate chain" bug.<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"16:39:14 <Peerko>	cool it loads"}}</ref>

== Bugs ==
* Focus bug with mouse and keyboard when fullscreen mode switching on Linux is not fixed.<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"16:40:18 <vede> Well, I was able to play, but still lost keyboard focus after going fullscreen and nonfullscreen."}}</ref>
